entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 13 April 2023
